page.title: 19The Games We Play.
page.content: We play a lot of games.As many as you want can play blocky.One person is on block and we use a post as a block.The one who is on counts,and when he has finished counting he has to find someone ,run and touch the block first.He has to say"Block 1,2,3". Polo is a game where someone who is on names a subject like boys' names.The other people choose a name and one person shouts them out.The person who is on chooses one and the person whose name it is has to race against him.The one who wins is on. We also play red letter,tallyho,and bulldog.The girls like playing a bottle of beer where you have to decide ,apart from one person out of the ring who they go with,and then you come inside the ring.You then shout who they go with.Then you break the hands up,and push somebody in.
